pages.title: 关于
pages.text: 人和人唯一的差别就是认知。要不断反思、迭代、完善自己的认知能力抓住时间每每思量，需要弥补的缺陷都很多；每处都无法深究下去，每每发现知识匮乏；构建了这么多知识结构后还是缺少行动力，缺少恒心，缺少效率；希望幻灭成业障 THEN *springboot industry demo sso,mq,shiro,encrypt and so on db, network, os java, effective java jvm concurrency design pattern algorithm

posts.title: 添加categories和tags
posts.excerpt: 在next主题下添加分类和标签菜单 next/_config.yml打开 menu下对应item的comment hexo new page [categories,tags],并分别修改所生成页面对应md-source/categories/index.md 添加一行 type: categories 之后hexo n 的post 中添加 categories和tags, 格式:
posts.text: 在next主题下添加分类和标签菜单 next/_config.yml打开 menu下对应item的comment hexo new page [categories,tags],并分别修改所生成页面对应md-source/categories/index.md 添加一行 type: categories 之后hexo n 的post 中添加 categories和tags, 格式: 1234567title: 添加categories和tagsdate: 2019-10-11 01:09:04categories: - 其他tags: - hexo- next

posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
